degreePrograms.title: BS(COMPUTER SCIENCE)
degreePrograms.careerOpportunities: Your career prospects will be excellent: You may become a software engineer, programmer, web developer, games programmer or computer graphic designer.
degreePrograms.exam: Cut-off marks in the NTS-NAT IE exam to be determined by the University

programInfo.one: Impart in-depth understanding of Computer Science field according to international standards
programInfo.three: Build diverse careers in Computer Science as productive IT professionals and entrepreneurs for the socio-economic development
programInfo.four: Prepare students for the graduate level studies and research
programInfo.five: Develop effective communication, management and leadership skills
programInfo.six: Impart professional ethics and collaborative team player abilities

awardOfDegree.title: For the award of BS (Computer Science) degree, a student must have:
awardOfDegree.one: Passed courses totalling at least 130 credit hours, including all those courses which have been specified as Core courses.
awardOfDegree.two: Obtained a CGPA of at least 2.00

eligibility.one: At least 60% marks in SSC (Matric) or an equivalent examination (such as O-levels) AND
eligibility.two: Should have studied for HSSC or an equivalent qualification, for at least two years AND
eligibility.three: At least 50% marks in HSSC or an equivalent qualification AND
eligibility.five: studied Mathematics at the HSSC or equivalent level. OR
eligibility.six: pass HSSC level Mathematics exam within one year of admission (for candidates with Pre-medical background), conducted by any one of the following:
eligibility.seven: Local Board of Intermediate & Secondary Education
eligibility.eight: A recognized Foreign Board (Oxford, Cambridge, etc.)

selectionCriteria.one: 50% weight to higher percent score of SSC (or an equivalent exam) OR HSSC (or an equivalent exam) AND
selectionCriteria.two: 50% weight to marks obtained in Admission Test
